title: S1 Looking for dynamic duo or trio, to get to gold.
body: I'm real serious about getting into gold. I'm silver 1, I play Mid or ADC the most, I mainly do mid tho, however I can switch to ADC when needed. I'm looking for someone that's willing to teach me or just to play with. Please be at least S1. Thanks, add "Dusty" :)

replies.body:
I am one who is stuck around G5, main top, can jg and morg sup, usually play in afternoons. 
IGN Sisters10086
Sure just add me in game. I'll help ya
